name: Untied
description:
Synopsis

"Untied" is a side scroller 2d platform game set in a black and white surreal toy workshop where you play as the little ballerina that must find the light to escape from the darkness.

Controls Keyboard and Mouse:
  • WASD and Arrows -- Move
  • Spacebar -- Jump
  • "E" -- Interact
Controller:
  • Left Stick -- Move
  • Left Stick (Press) -- Jump
  • South Button ("A" for Xbox & "X" for PS) -- Interact
Credits Team:

Programming:

Art:

  • Animation: Sergi Segarra Garrucho 
  • Environment: Sergi Gómez Segura, Sergi Segarra Garrucho, Andrea Raya Martínez
  • Lighting and Post Processing: Gerard Torras Moliné
  • Cinematics: Andrea Raya Martínez
Music
  • Composer: Andrea Raya Martínez
A Global Game Jam Videogame 2022
  • Theme: Duality
  • Time available: Two Days
  • Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/untied-8
